powergrid.tasks

Class TravelTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.tasks.Task
      • powergrid.tasks.StepTask
        • powergrid.tasks.TravelTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Task>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TravelNearestTask

    public class TravelTask
extends StepTask
    This Task travels to the given destination using all available methods.

        public TravelTask(Point destination)
        Creates a new TravelTask set to travel to the specified Point.

        The Task will be made with priority 0.

        Parameters:
        destination - the point this TravelTask travels to

    • Method Detail

      • setDestination

        public void setDestination(Point dest)

      • start

        public void start()
        Calculates a path and checks preconditions for this TravelTask. The Task is immediately canceled when getDestination() == null, or when the PathFinder class has found no path to the given destination.
        Overrides:
        start in class StepTask

      • step

        public void step()
        Attempts to move to the next Point in the path, or waits if no action is required.

        When the Player has more then 20 stamina left, but the Player's run mode is set to false, Run mode is automatically enabled.

        Specified by:
        step in class StepTask

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method overrides the basic reset behavior of throwing an Exception.

        This method resets the pathCounter so that the path will be recalculated. TravelTask instances can be run over and over again and the path will be recalculated every time. This allows creation of reusable TravelTasks, which can be useful when moving between a fixed set of Points.

        Overrides:
        reset in class Task

      • getDestination

        public Point getDestination()
        returns the destination that this TravelTask is set to travel to.
        Returns:
        the destination of this TravelTask
